title: City Seasons Hotels celebrate a decade of hospitality in UAE and Oman
text:
City Seasons Hotels celebrate a decade of hospitality in UAE and Oman City Seasons Hotels celebrate a decade of hospitality in UAE and Oman Details Category: Hotel   16:10 October 2015 marks the 10th anniversary of City Seasons Hotels. The company that was founded in 2005 by Sheikh Ahmed Bin Ham, Vice President City Seasons Hotels, counts 6 properties in Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Al Ain and Muscat. Committed to cater to business as well as leisure travelers with affordable luxury and contemporary comfort, the group of hotels growth over the past years has been a steady one. 
Starting with City Seasons Suites in Dubai, a Deluxe Hotel apartment located opposite Deira City Center, the venture turned into a fully-fledged owned and managed chain of Hotels with another four 4-star properties in Abu Dhabi, Al Ain, Muscat and again Dubai. With properties strategically located in city hubs in proximity to business districts as well as leisure centers, City Seasons have successfully attracted a follow base of families with young children who come back for the friendly service, the secure surrounding as much as for the comfort and spaciousness of the rooms and suites. “This milestone is very important for us as owners and hotel developers, said Sheikh Ahmed Bin Ham. ‘We have started with a very clear vision on offering comfort and luxury while keeping our rate structure at an affordable place; over the years our strategy has proven successful and the chain has steadily grown into the 5-star scale. This success would not have been complete without the tireless effort of our management and staff; with them embracing the vision of the owners and building the City Seasons reputation on it. “Indeed this success reflects 10 years of great hospitality and will be followed by many years to come,” Sheikh Ahmed concluded. The latest property to open was Royal Rose Abu Dhabi, the first 5-star hotel of the group that has too much to offer. Branded as the Versailles of Abu Dhabi, Royal Rose is a luxurious hotel that combines the splendor of 17th century French palaces with a warm Arabian hospitality. It offers upscale accommodation with latest technology; proudly located in one of the busiest areas in the capital, Royal Rose has a grand atmosphere of its own. The success of Royal Rose entering a very competitive market and attracting travelers from Europe and the Far East, has prompted the owners to repeat the experience with a similar property planned in Muscat. In Dubai a third City Seasons is scheduled to open its doors in the coming months. Located on Burjuman Mall side, it offers central location paired with modern comfort and excellent services. Closer to home, City Seasons Hotels are branching into the budget category with another 3 properties planned for Dubai by 2020. Employees of City Seasons come from 24 different nationalities and bring along a true essence of hospitality so dear to the chain. To mark the 10th anniversary, all hotels are offering a special 10% discount on their BAR rate - when booked directly- as well as a unified AED 10 on beverages in all their outlets. Moreover raffle draws and prizes will be distributed weekly to clients and fan base through website and social media platforms. Related articles
